features: 【THREE-LEVEL ADJUSTABLE】If you're looking for an automatic soap dispenser that's all about customization, look no further! Our dispenser has three different bubble settings, so you can adjust it to fit your needs. It also comes with a top-notch infrared sensor that can handle even the brightest light - just make sure to install it at the right distance.(Install it 0.65ft/20cm away from your table)

【FULL-SCREEN DISPLAY】Get ready to be wowed by this soap dispenser's full-screen display! It shows you how much power is left and even the indoor temperature. Plus, it's waterproof (IPX5), so you can use it in damp environments without worrying about damage. Just make sure to keep the sensor dry!

【COMPATIBLE WITH VARIOUS SOAPS】No matter what kind of soap you prefer - hand soap, dish soap, or body wash - this dispenser can handle it all. Plus, with its large 12oz/300ml capacity, you can get up to 500 uses, which should last your family for around 50 days.(Regular gel soap needs to be diluted with water, foam soap can be added directly)

【BATTERY LASTS FOR 4 MONTHS】Say goodbye to constantly charging your soap dispenser! With our built-in 2000 capacity battery, you can use it for up to four whole months before needing to recharge. Plus, the international advanced motor technology means it uses less energy and operates quietly, so you can enjoy it for longer.

【DRILL-FREE INSTALLATION】Our rechargeable soap dispenser comes with strong adhesive strips that won't leave any marks, and it's easy to install on smooth surfaces like tile or mirror. Plus, you get a one-year warranty and 24/7 support to help solve any issues. Buy with confidence and if you have any problems, Just shoot us an email on Amazon and we'll get back to you in a jiffy!(Do not use traceless stickers on cement walls)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Subvert The Tradition And Redefine The New Way Of Washing Hands! Every Upgrade Is For A Better User Experience! 1. The first generation: ordinary automatic soap dispenser Disadvantages: Need to use matching hand sanitizer, can not replace other cleaning liquids, can not meet the different needs of customers. 2. Second generation: automatic soap dispenser with changeable liquid Disadvantages: No gear adjustment, single foam output, unable to meet the needs of different groups of people 3. The third generation: three-speed adjustable + changeable liquid automatic soap dispenser Advantages: different cleaning liquids can be replaced, and the bubble volume can be adjusted in three levels, which can meet the needs of different people

Installation Method Clean the wall with a ragTear off the adhesive and paste it on the wall, let it stand for more than 24 hoursBuckle the machine on the adhesiveRead the user manualStart the machine Wall-Mounted Automatic Soap Dispenser Every product is built with heart Specification: 5.1in/13cm x 2.5 in/6.2cm Maximum capacity: 300ml/12oz Battery capacity: 2000 Product weight: 260g/0.57lb Waterproof level: IPX5 Installation method: strong non-marking glue wall-mounted
More Details Show 0.25s extremely fast foaming, no need to wait Nano-level volumizing foam IPX5 level waterproof
45° bionic inclination angle, foam does not stick to the machine Punch-free strong and non-marking glue, easy to use Steps to install the soap dispenser on the wall

Frequently Asked Questions Q: How should hand soap be added? A: If it is a foam hand soap, you can pour it directly without adding water A: If it is an ordinary hand soap, please add the hand soap first, and then add water. The most appropriate ratio is 1 hand soap : 3 water, which can be adjusted according to the desired bubble concentration. Q: The soap dispenser works, but no bubbles come out? A: The initial judgment is that the outlet is blocked. The solution is to add warm water and adjust it to the highest level for repeated induction and dredging.

TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDES! Not enough bubbles? Generally, this is caused by insufficient amount of ordinary hand soap. We recommend that the ratio of ordinary hand soap to water is 1:3, and the amount of hand soap should be more than less. Shake well before turning it on.You can feel it when you stretch your hand over, but no bubbles come out? Only a small amount of liquid comes out? Probably due to the blockage of the outlet, the hand soap was not shaken evenly when adding the liquid, which caused the hand soap to precipitate, or the ordinary hand soap was directly added to cause blockage. It is recommended to add warm water and adjust to the highest level for repeated induction.The product you are browsing now is a foam type. If you add foam soap, you can add it directly. If you choose ordinary gel soap, please dilute it with a ratio of 1 soap: 3 water before adding it.No response to charging? Due to the fact that the product is sometimes turned on during transportation, the battery is completely drained. After receiving the product, please continue to charge it for 1.5-2 hours, and then use it after it is fully charged.No reach sensor, but the soap dispenser foams by itself? We recommend that the machine be installed at a distance of more than 20cm from the countertop to prevent false induction caused by reflections on the countertop.Can't use a soap with particles, such as starlight hand soap, fluorescent hand soap, etc., particles can cause blockage.We support after-sales service for one year, if your return window has been closed, please take the initiative to inform us, we will solve the problem for you, thank you for your support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The company is the reason I love my soap dispenser quiet honestly
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought two of these for our bathrooms. I had a different motion sensor one with temp in our one bathroom but it randomly shot out soap, a joke in the family. And it then just stopped working on us. I got this after. I was hesitant because it sticks and stays stuck on the wall. It sort of ruined my wall in one spot because I didn’t plan it very well. But that’s because of the space in the bathroom, where my little can reach easily, and where the plug can access it easily. But once all set, it was great! I just don’t like how low I have it. But that’s on me. It still works great there. That one has ONCE randomly ejected. The other one in the other bathroom after it emptied stopped working. So I wrote to the sellers and asked for help with the product. They helped me to try and resolve the problem. However, that one just didn’t resolve. Other issues I had resolved eventually. But the soap coming out never did resolve. It made the noise. But it wouldn’t send any soap out. So they gladly sent me a new one. Which is up and running great! With customer service like that it just helps you to feel supported by your purchases. And they said to reach out any time with problems. I feel backed by my product then. Like I’m not just buying something and that’s it. So many times I read reviews and people are trying to figure out how to return. Or hating what they bought and feeling stuck. So knowing I have the help of the seller behind me on my purchase makes me feel like what I bought is worth the value of my money. In todays economy where we’re all struggling with inflation you don’t want to buy something and then have to toss it one month later. With this if it stops working you can contact the seller and they’ll help you to resolve the issue. I love that 100%. This hand soap dispenser was worth the money for me. I have two boys who love to play with soap. So leveling out the soap is a nice bonus. And the ability to not have touch any surfaces is something I love since I’m autoimmune. I’ve been trying to switch to all automatic where I can to help with that. So I love how easy it is to use. How effective it is. It recognizes my hand under it vs when I’m just standing there so it doesn’t eject soap like the old dispenser would. It tells time which I LOVE! So I have one clock ahead and this one on time to help me in the mornings keep track of my time. And it tells the temp so I love that because I’m always curious how warm it is in a room because I’m always cold, so this helps me prove I am cold, or actually just off on my body chemistry. Anyway you look at this dispense it’s just a great value for your money. It charges super fast. I DO have to charge it about once a week. But we have a lot of traffic in both bathrooms so it’s always picking up movement which drains the battery. I COULD turn off the human recognition and then just stick my hand under to use it. But it wasn’t always effective that way for me. And with two small boys I want 100% effective every time so they’re not going to be crazy boys and get into trouble because something didn’t work. But there’s lots of options with this dispenser. I suggest just reading the manual carefully when you get it and tinkering around with it once it’s charged. And don’t just say, I got this! Because you will forget, so keep book handy too for WHEN you forget and a problem ensues! I was reading it again yesterday after getting the new one and laughing because I’d read all of it. And here I was having some of these issues. And forgotten all that I’d read thinking, I got this! It’s JUST a soap dispenser! Like it says, clean after each cycle of filling. Something they’d told me too when they’d helped me. So just having it on hand to help you will be a smart lesson I’m learning from my own mistake. It’s not JUST a soap dispenser. It WILL have issues. So have it on hand to know how to handle them if they come up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome seller!!! I love this little gadget.
reviews.reviewText: It esthetically pleasing, space saving, product saving (it can be adjusted to put out the right amount every time), and every visitor to my bathroom has been in awe of it (much to my pride). Unfortunately, after almost a year of every day use, it clogged up. Just like the manufacturer recommended, I poured in warm water and tried dredging; but it stopped working. I tried dredging every time I walked past it for days after. Eventually, I contacted the seller and they immediately sent me a replacement. But, I think I got a lemon because right out of the box it did not work. I tried dredging but that did not work. Luckily, I had made a video of the entire thing. I sent that to the seller and they promptly refunded me. Now I’m off to order another one. I love this gadget so much that I’m willing to keep trying until I get one that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought two, only one works.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought two of these for each bathroom. One of them works pretty well, but the other will not dispense any soap at all & the sensor is horrible. I just hung it up on the mirror, filled it with soap & nothing comes out at all. I can hear the motor run, but zero soap. The sensor also barely works, you have to put ur hand under it like 3 or 4 times & be very intentional, actually touch the sensor, to get it to work & dispense soap, but no soap ever comes out. See my video above. And it is not the soap I bought cause it’s foam soap, specific to this type of dispenser, & is the consistency of water… u couldn’t get this soap any thinner unless u just put straight water in it. And this same soap works fine in the other dispenser I have in a different bathroom. So… quality control is not good… u basically have a 50/50 shot of getting one that works properly out of the box or one that will not work at all. I’m going to try to return this broken one, but it was trash day at my house & my husband accidentally threw out the boxes they came in. Not sure if I can exchange it without a box or not. If I can’t return or exchange it, then I literally threw my money in the trash cause the defective one is completely useless. I tried doing the auto clean thing to see if it would start working after doing that, even though it is brand new out of the box, but that did not solve my issue. Also, be careful when removing or putting on the rubber seal where the soap goes in. The gasket is very cheap & not well made, so when I put it back on, it went right through the hole & into the dispenser. I had to dump out all the soap & fight for 30 minutes to get it back out. This dispenser made my morning very frustrating. I’m hoping for at least an exchange for one that works. Maybe I’m just unlucky & got a defective one… cause this seems to have all positive reviews which is why I chose this specific one. If I can exchange without hassle & the replacement works, I will change my review completely. Returning things for me is a huge hassle cause I live over 30 minutes away from any UPS drop off location, so I try to do as much research as I can before a purchase. This one had so many positive reviews that I thought I couldn’t go wrong.UPDATE: Once I started the return process on the one of these that wouldn’t work, the second one also quit working properly & wouldn’t dispense soap. However, both of these were replaced by the company with no issues on the return process. The new ones do seem to be working much better. I also moved one of them higher on the wall than the first one I had installed which may have helped with the sensor a bit. I have had no further issues with these so far. I added stars back to my review due to the replacements & that the new ones are working much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks high tech, works great.
reviews.reviewText: This was a surprisingly great purchase. Not only doesn't this thing look really high tech and fancy, but it also saves you a lot on soap. Recharging and refilling needs to happen every 3/4 months if you are a single person. You can use whatever soap you like. Just make sure if you are using standard soap like I am, to dilute it or it will screw up the internals. Also If you just installed it and it is not working make sure you dredge it. If you read the instructions, there is a cleaning/dredge mode you can use. I had to use it the first time I installed my unit. Motion detector and hand detection is fine, no issues. Though I do wish the screen would stay on longer after being triggered. This dispenser looks cool, will save you on soap, and is easy to use. Defiantly worth a buy if you're in the market for a new soap dispenser.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect! Hoping it will last long.
reviews.reviewText: Very neat looking and works perfectly. I just really hope this particular product last longer than the previous one that I purchased from a different brand.

reviews.reviewTitle: La consistencia de la espuma es perfecta
reviews.reviewText: Funciona hasta el momento bien , llevo 2 meses de uso y me parece muy buen producto , gotea un poco , pero lo tolero porque funciona bien a comparación de marcas mas caras con Bed Bath , etc . Me hubiera gustado que el indicador del jabón, la pila y el tipo de espuma fueran más grandes para mejor visibilidad

Was very happy when first naught. Was nothing but a nightmare ever since I tried to refill it. Just seems too cheaply made for the price I paid in Australia for it.Not happy at all with this unfortunately.Great idea but I need a good quality one to last the expensive price attached. Don’t buy this one.
Love this automatic soap dispenser. Easy to install, easy to set up and easy to use.
